description: Write a program that creates a list containing the numbers 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5. Print the list, then remove the numbers 1 and 3, then print the list again.
correct-program:
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
# Print the original list print(numbers)
# Remove the numbers 1 and 3 numbers.remove(1) numbers.remove(3)
# Print the list after removal print(numbers)
